sourcesContent:
import { Button, Col, Card, Form, Row } from "react-bootstrap";
import React from "react";
import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";



function ProfileDetails() {
  const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm();
  const onSubmit = data => {
    console.log(data);
  }; // form submit function will invoke after successful validation


  return (
    <Card>
      <Card.Body>
        <Card.Title className="p-2">User Details</Card.Title>
        <Form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
          <Form.Group as={Row} controlId="UserName">
            <Form.Label className="sr-only">First Name</Form.Label>
            <Col>
              <Form.Control
                placeholder="First Name"
                name="firstName"
                type="text"
                required
              />
            </Col>
            <Form.Label className="sr-only">Last Name</Form.Label>
            <Col>
              <Form.Control
                type="text"
                placeholder="Last Name"
                required
              />
            </Col>
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group as={Row} controlId="title">
            <Form.Label className="sr-only">Title</Form.Label>
            <Col>
              <Form.Control
                placeholder="Title"
                type="text"
                required
              />
            </Col>
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group as={Row} controlId="company">
            <Form.Label className="sr-only">
              Company
            </Form.Label>
            <Col>
              <Form.Control  placeholder="Company" type="text" />
            </Col>
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group as={Row} controlId="location">
            <Form.Label className="sr-only">City</Form.Label>
            <Col className="pr-1">
              <Form.Control
                
                placeholder="City"
                type="text"
                required
              />
            </Col>
            <Form.Label className="sr-only">Country</Form.Label>
            <Col className="pl-1">
              <Form.Control
                
                placeholder="Country"
                type="text"
                required
              />
            </Col>
          </Form.Group>

          <Button disabled type="submit">
            Save
          </Button>
        </Form>
      </Card.Body>
    </Card>
  );
}

export default ProfileDetails;
